name: defaultroot
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool meowfacts.
Tool description:  a simple api which returns a catfact 
API description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can recieve a specific or more than one fact.

count.description: The number of cat facts to return. If not specified, a default number of facts will be returned.

factid.description: An optional ID to retrieve a specific cat fact. If not specified, random facts will be returned.

lang.description: The locale in which to retrieve the cat facts. Defaults to 'eng' (English).
